She has a really strong voice, so she does best belting out ballads in my opinion.

Something similar to that happened to me once.
I was driving home with my window down after my former friend essentially hurt me in the most personal way possible and by the time I got to the first stop light, I was full on sobbing. I was in no condition to be driving, but there was a car ahead of me at the light that was preventing me from turning into the nearest parking lot. The woman driving in the car next to mine rolled down her window and kindly asked if I needed any help. I was so embarrassed that I had be caught in such a vulnerable position in public, but I told her that I would be okay. Then she said that she would pray for me. The light changed and she drove off while I turned into the parking lot.
The difference between the hurt that my best friend caused me and the absolute kindness of a stranger has always stuck with me. I'm not even religious, but I'm always striving to be as helping and compassionate as that woman.

WRITING.TITLE: High school student wears Gina Rodriguez's Golden Globes dress to her prom
17 Times "Jane The Virgin" Made You Feel All The Things

WRITING.TEXT: Does Daredevil ever pick up? I swear it took me 4 times to try to make it through the pilot before I would turn it off from boredom. I'm only on episode 5, but I can't seem to get in to it.
Does this mean Eddie is coming back?
I think so. Mine said the same thing.

I think something fishy is going on with Caitlin since we never saw her make the choice to return to Team Flash.
Honestly, I just want to see her have a greater role in the show either as a part of the team or as a villan. This season didn't really focus on her, just her romance with Jay. I'd love some character development! I think we've gotten maybe 1 throwaway line about her family, but I want more.
Oh, god. That actually makes sense. But I don't want her to :(
So glad she's back!

WRITING.TITLE: Wilmer Valderrama: Everybody (Backstreet's Back) vs Gina Rodriguez: Free Your Mind | Lip Sync Battle

WRITING.TEXT:
I'd really love to see Luisa back and involved with her family. She needs a redemption arc, and if they can redeem Petra, then they can redeem Luisa. (But we're all agreed, Magda is the worst, right?) I'd love to see Luisa get to know her nieces and nephew, and be suspicious of Derek.
Some of my favorite scenes of Luisa are when she is searching for her mother, thinking she's alive, and then finding out that she really is dead, so I'd really love for the writers to continue to develop her story.

Didn't a doc/nurse ask her at some point if twins ran in her family?
Yup. Because we all thought that the Anna and Elsa were Zazo's kids since he's a twin.
I would love to see how Luisa would interact with Derek. He'd be her half-brother's half-brother!
\#Michaelthe(Massage)Virgin

After party bachelor party bachelorette party. I really hope that they are moving to flesh out Derek because I agree, he seems like a jerk. I'm happy that we seem to be past the crime-lord story lines.
I think the twins were the worst part of the episode. I'd much rather have more Lina backstory or Rafael and Derek scenes than them.
I couldn't take Michael seriously when he was telling Jane his vows because of that shirt.
I love Lina episodes! They are my favorite.
Loooove Filly Brown.
\#OHGODOHGODOHGOD
Shoot, sorry to spoil that for you!

I think Kesha's guest starring was probably the least significant/fun one yet, but I can't wait to see [spoiler!](#sCharo ) in the next episode since she's been mentioned a few times throughout the series.
In regards to the article, I'm mostly excited to see Gina get to salsa dance since she is a trained salsa dancer!
I still sometimes follow up on my Secret Santa to see what he's been up to.

Was attempting to flirt with my friend over text. He told me he was watching salmon fishing in the yemen. I wanted to appear as cool and as hipster as he was, so I text back that that was so cool and interesting! Did he find a live steam online where he could really watch people in yemen salmon fishing?? No. Turns out he was watching the movie, Salmon Fishing In The Yemen, and that he doesn't like the concept of people fishing for sport and not survival. I quickly backtracked and agreed with him all while feeling like the biggest idiot in the world.
Still can't look at that movie without blushing and feeling extremely embarrassed.
I want to trust him too!

But instead they did jane-advisor, jane-Michaels parents, raf-brother, jane-Michael, petra-babies, petra-raf, alba-boyfriend, Rogelio-lola, rogelio-jane, rogelio-fame. Like just pick a few things and flesh out the details.
For real though! There was so much going on in this episode! It made my head spin.

That's how I feel too.
Abuelo Mateo is practically the perfect devoted husband and father from what we've seen so far. He gets disowned from his rich family to marry Alba. He moves to the US with his new expectant wife. He helped Alba adjust to their new home and create new traditions to make her feel more comfortable. He's described as the love of Alba's life and Alba has even said that she never dated after him because she didn't want to dishonor him after all that he did for her.
And now we're supposed to root for Juan Pablo Segura and his curse?
I'd much rather have the priest back.
Edit: And his mustache really bothers me. /end rant
Being hospitalized for my suicide attempt and eating disorder. I have an entirely new life in treatment and recovery now.
Alba did look great in that dress though!

Michael sticking up for Mateo to his parents was everything.
Edit: I take it back. Rogelio opening up to Jane about the kidnapping is everything!
Same. Especially because my computer/internet kept freezing on the 3rd or 4th ad and forced me to refresh the page, resulting in another 4 ads which would then get frozen on too! Frustrating!
Those hearts when he learned that Michael and Jane are engaged again 3
I know! I really liked her too.
\#inconvenienttruth
More like a definite hottie.
"Careful, Jane. You're running out of English department faculty members!"
Is that a new younger Jane? I don't remember every seeing Jane at 9 years old!

WRITING.TEXT: I thought that Crazy Ex-Girlfriend was gone for sure, but I'm glad it got renewed.
It's not for everyone, but I love it.
I agree. He better get rescued/rescue himself quickly.
This episode and the last felt so hashtag heavy. I thought it was maybe just me!
Your hair is nice.
Me too! I loved their brutally honest conversation at Petra's baby shower.
Mods are Jay Garrick are Zoom, CONFIRMED.

And yes, Rolegio did tell Xo to have an abortion. That's one of the reasons Liliana (glam-ma) and Xo didn't get along because Rolegio told Liliana that Xo was hiding her child from him when really Rolegio told Xo to have an abortion.
I don't know if it's mentioned how long he is married to Melissa (his second wife), but it can't be any longer than 9 years. In the Scientology video, which is 10 years old, Rolegio is still married to Luciana. So during that 10 years, he divorces Luciana, marries Melissa, and is divorced to Melissa by season 1 of JtV, which was last year. So I think he did help raise the twins as their step-father because they would be a lot younger if they were Rolegio's children.
I think there are a lot of us who can't watch live, so we comment throughout the week. I love checking the sub and seeing (X new comments). It lets me fangirl all week until the next episode!

I think the 6 month time hop kinda messed with the flow. Especially for Jane's relationships. It looks like a flip flop, but really Jane spent 6 months trying to get over Michael and Rafael has been pining over Jane for 6 months.
There was a period when it was just Jane focusing on raising Mateo. We just never really saw it.

I'm glad Xo is putting her needs first even if it costs their relationship. Shout out to glam-ma who called this happening in one of her first episodes!
Also if they have twins play Mateo, are they going to have quadruplets play the twins? Hmm...
She was looking him up?! When?
